name: Spell Mastery
effects: choose one level 1 and one level 2 spell in your spellbook that have a casting time of an action
you always have those spells prepared and can cast them at their lowest level without expending a spell slot
limits: to cast either spell at a higher level, you must expend a spell slot
when you finish a long rest, you can replace one chosen spell with another eligible spell of the same level
